mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM resource r WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM department_resource dr INNER JOIN department dt ON dr.department_id = dt.id INNER JOIN department_user du ON du.department_id= dt.id INNER JOIN USER u ON u.id = du.user_id WHERE u.id = 1 AND dr.resource_id = r.id ) AND r.resource_type = 1 ORDER BY r.seq
